title: The art of giuing Describing the true nature, and right vse of liberality: and prouing that these dayes of the gospell haue farre exceeded the former times of superstition in true charitie and magnificence. By Thomas Cooper.
author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.
publisher: Printed [by T. Snodham] for T. Pauier, and are to be sold in Iuy Lane,
notes: Dedication to Sir J. Rotherham and others.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
